components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to AT&T in the US From a Subset of Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in MMS delivery delays when sending messages to AT&T in the US from a Subset of Shortcodes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to AT&T in the US from a subset of shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to AT&T in the US from a subset of shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to Twilio Trinidad and Tobago Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to observe inbound call failures to Twilio Trinidad and Tobago phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Issues With Onboarding New Numbers or Deprovisioning 10DLC Numbers

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate delays when trying to onboard new numbers, or de-provisioning numbers on T-Mobile 10DLC A2P. We expect to provide another update on July 12th at 17:56 PT or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Motiv network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 July 2023 at 11:20 PDT until 12 July 2023 at 14:20 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Motiv Russia handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 12 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 12 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 12 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 13 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 12 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 13 July 2023 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT through to 11 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 01 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
07 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 07 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
08 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 08 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
29 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

26 June 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 26 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT
